welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Strood, a charming town known for its historic bridge and stunning countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Southend Airport is a smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
